overview:
Bill Crowley manages hyperWALLET’s key customer and partner relationships, and ensures that the company’s technology and services are meeting their needs.

He is responsible for all aspects of product development - from conceptual discussions, through internal development, and on to final commissioning. Prior to joining hyperWALLET, Bill was the Systems Operations Manager for an e-commerce company where he was responsible for leading the information technology team in the management of a complex distributed environment.

Bill received a Bachelor of Commerce from Dalhousie University and has numerous additional technical and professional certifications.
